long_description: Pack your paddles for the canoe trip of a lifetime in the one million acres of the Boundary Waters Canoe Area. Author: Daniel Pauly. University of Minnesota Press; copyright 2005. Soft cover; 421 pages; 51 black and white maps. Provides an overview of each entry point as well as detailed descriptions of more than one hundred specific routes. Includes ranking of difficulty level, pros and cons, and 51 maps featuring major waterways, portages and campsites. Learn how to obtain a permit, design your own canoeing routes, and help maintain the ecological integrity of the wilderness. Discover pictographs, mining sites, logging railroads and ruins on your trip.
short_description: Pack your paddles for the canoe trip of a lifetime in the one million acres of the Boundary Waters Canoe Area.
